short_summary: CO2 Electrolysis Test Station. One article required. Supplied by one Contractor.
description: See tender description. click to view files in the details tab for supporting documents.
full_summary:
# CO2 Electrolysis Test Station

## Tender Announcement
We are seeking a contract for the provision of one CO2 Electrolysis Test Station, in accordance with the Statement of Requirement at Annex "A". The equipment is to be delivered to the National Research Council Canada (NRC) at 4250 Westbrook Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1W5.

## Contract Details
* **GSIN Code**: 41100000 - Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
* **Delivery Date**: The equipment must be received by September 30, 2025
* **Delivery Point**: National Research Council Canada, 4250 Westbrook Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1W5, Canada

## Tender Information
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-58095
* **Amendment Number**: 8
* **Publication Date**: August 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 2, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT (expiration of extension)
* **Entity Contractor**: National Research Council of Canada

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Cindy Marshall, Cindy.Marshall@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

## Enquiries
* **Enquiries Deadline**: Five (5) calendar days before the tender closing date
* **Contact Information**: Cindy Marshall, Cindy.Marshall@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

## Attachments
* [link to tender notice documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8640/en-rfp-co2-electrolysis-test-station.pdf)
* [link to Request for Proposal and Amendment Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8640/fr-rfp-co2-electrolysis-test-station_f.pdf)

Note: There were 8 amendments made to this tender, but only a brief summary of them was provided by the contractor. The additional details for the amendment have been ommitted to keep the text concise.  Please let me know if you need me to add those details.  was omitted to meet the 400-word constraint.
